step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold! You maintained the position effectively.
You're returning to the start position. Watch for your elbows drifting forward as you reverse the motion.
Second rep starting well. Ensure hands remain clasped and relaxed in your lap.
Good job bringing hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping those elbows in and close.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head! Keep that head tall and avoid any forward pull.
You held that position well. Great control!
Returning to the start. Be mindful of keeping your elbows from moving forward during the reversal.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright head position throughout.
